abstract: IDC predicts that the market for Big Data technology and services will reach $16.9 billion by 2015, growing at 40 percent a year. The research firm's report makes the case that Big Data is moving well beyond the "science project" phase into the commercial mainstream.

headline.main: IDC Sizes Up the Big Data Market
